La Ruta de la Seda

Freelance - Feb-2019

"La Ruta de la Seda" is a silk boutique in Costa Rica. The store focuses not only on importing the best quality of silk, but also on providing workshops around art and Asian culture. I was commisioned to design and create their new brand identity.

SKILLS

Design & Branding, Illustration


Tools

Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop


Conceptualization


For the brand, I wanted to create something that resembled the cultural richness of the store and its connection to Asian culture, specifically the Thai and Indian cultures. Taking into consideration that with each purchase, the customer receives a leaf of the Bodhi tree, I wanted to use the leaf as a visual asset.


Logo


The logo design was by far my favorite part of the project. Taking into consideration that the store gives a leaf of the Bodhi tree to each customer, I decided to create the logo of the store based on that. Deconstructing the leaf into it's skeleton, it works as a standalone but also in a form of pattern for the bags and other merchandise.

Logo


The logo design was by far my favorite part of the project. Taking into consideration that the store gives a leaf of the Bodhi tree to each customer, I decided to create the logo of the store based on that. Deconstructing the leaf into it's skeleton, it works as a standalone but also in a form of pattern for the bags and other merchandise.

Color


The use of color was incredibly important in the brand since it had to reflect the quality of the product. For the colors, I selected three colors that are constantly depicted in traditional Thai art. Black, Gold and Red.

Font


For the fonts, I decided to select a Serif Font for the Primary Typeface and a Sans-Serif as the Secondary Typeface. This improved the readability of both fonts while working together with the main logo.

Font


For the fonts, I decided to select a Serif Font for the Primary Typeface and a Sans-Serif as the Secondary Typeface. This improved the readability of both fonts while working together with the main logo.
